About Me:

Hello!

My name is Andrew Park and I am Junior majoring in Computer Science with a minor in Digital Communication Information and Media (DCIM) in the Rutgers University School of Arts and Science Honors Program.

I have an interest in front-end/web development and I am currently learning CSS/HTML and Javascript! This website is my first project, and I am excited to learn more :)

Feel free to reach out using any of the methods in the "Contact" section!
